Key.Original: You have been fully healed by an administrator. Enjoy!
Key.English: You have been fully healed by an administrator. Enjoy!
Key.French: Vous avez été complètement soigné par un administrateur. Profitez en!

Key.Original: An administrator as allowed you to jump back in game, the JIP menu will open.
Key.English: An administrator as allowed you to jump back in game, the JIP menu will open.
Key.French: Un administrateur vous a autorisé à retourner en jeu, le menu JIP va s'ouvrir.

Key.Original: You have been punished by an admin, feel the almighty wrath of the powerful!
Key.English: You have been punished by an admin, feel the almighty wrath of the powerful!
Key.French: Vous avez été puni par un admin, vous allez ressentir la toute puissance de la colère divine!

Key.Original: The admin has forgiven you, the curse has been lifted!
Key.English: The admin has forgiven you, the curse has been lifted!
Key.French: L'admin vous a pardonné, la malédiction est levée!

Key.Original: Mission was terminated by an administrator
Key.English: Mission was terminated by an administrator
Key.French: Un administrateur a mis fin à la mission
Ajouter un poulet sur la tête
